intro.description: This cheat sheet guides you through the orchestration sequence created by the design pattern.

item.title: Verify Orchestration Sequence: SOM_OrchestrationSequence
item.description:
The orchestration sequence has the Description, Namespace, Order Item, and Orchestration Stages set according to the entries in the design pattern.
Template XQuery modules for Order Item Selector and Fulfillment Mode Expression have been placed in the resources/OrderRecognitionRule directory, and the location of these files has been added to the catalog.xml file using the ResourceURI value entered in the design pattern. These XQuery templates need to be modified for your specific business logic.
